Combat

Armor: Chain Mail Shield: Steel (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Bola (+12 1d6+3 B R20'; dexterity; expert); Light Mace (+12 1d4+3 B; strength; expert); Main-gauche (+12 1d4+3 P/S; strength; expert)

Fighter Weapon Mastery: Critical hits with a master proficiency weapon inflict its critical specialization effect
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Save: Fortitude: +11 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +12 (dexterity; expert); Will: +11 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Bravery: Save Expert (Will)
Bravery: Successes on Will saves vs. fear are critical successes, and the initial severity of frightened conditions is reduced by 1
Magic
Spell Slots: P1: 2; P4: 2; P7: 1; PC1: 2 Focus Points: 1 Attack: Primal: +13 (wisdom; master) Spell DC: Primal: 23 (wisdom; master)
Spells: Heal Animal (P1 Foc): (1) Touched animal (2 actions gives R30') regains 1d8 HP, or 1d8+8 HP with 2 actions (heightened +1 restores +1d8 HP or +1d8+8 HP)
Magic Notes:
Basic Druid Spellcasting: Has 1 1st-rank primal spell slot
Druid Dedication: Spell Trained (Primal)/Can prepare 2 primal cantrips each day
Expert Druid Spellcasting: Spell Expert (Primal)/Has 1 4th-rank primal spell slot
Master Druid Spellcasting: Spell Master (Primal)/Has 1 7th-rank primal spell slot
Order Spell (Animal): Knows the Heal Animal primal spell/Has a focus pool
Primal Breadth: Has additional archetype spell slots
Druid Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the primal tradition
Notes
Validation Errors:
Advanced Wilding Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 6 and basic wilding feature (currently 1)
Class Feats Allocation: 5 available vs. 8 allocated
Expert Druid Spellcasting Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 12, basic druid spellcasting feature (currently 1) and nature rank (currently 4) >= 3
Master Druid Spellcasting Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 18, expert druid spellcasting feature (currently 1) and nature rank (currently 4) >= 4
Primal Breadth Feat: Requires level (currently 5) >= 8 and basic druid spellcasting feature (currently 1)
